name: OneArmedSoldiers
description:
For the GMTK Gamejam, Me and my friend made a game that uses only One, source of input, this means, that all your funtionality is comfortabaly fitted on only the mouse.
This mechanic is very hadicap friendly, since mouse and keyboard based games may be hard to play for some, but with only the mouse, you only have to focus on that source of input.
Since the restricions of controls, the game has that very nostalgic feeling of the old wolfenstein or doom games from before.
The multiplayer function of this game is hosted by photon (free), so just type in your name and GO!

Controls: mouse

Good luck and Have fun!
